Comment: Our local/district representative is a real turd. She removed herself and her address from all of the public search sites, but I found a press release where she mentioned her kids names (who are adults) we were able to find her address by looking up her kids names in public registries.  When we flyer for issues in our area, we flyer our neighborhood (we also work with adjacent neighborhoods too), and also her specific street which is like 4 miles away (our district is huge).  She was beyond piiiiiised that we managed to flyer as far as her street (we flyered maybe a square mile and change, but not as far as her. Just her street). She did a zoom town hall and started yelling in anger about the flyers when someone brought up the issues. Someone had to cut her off. It was absolutely fucking wonderful.
